Author: the_real_blobfish
Text: My cousin got me a shirt that was like 2 sizes too big and I died a big inside. even my aunt and grandma were like “hahaha there’s no way you’d fit into that”

Author: amandathekat
Text: The same thing happened to me. My mom got me a size bigger in leggings and i tried to hard not to react and just smile and say thank you
